item.title: Aspose.Slides for Python via .NET 24.1 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Slides for Python via .NET 24.1 New Features and Enhancements Key Summary Category Related Documentation SLIDESNET-44348 4.5 MB ODP file after conversion to PDF becomes 500+ MB Enhancement https://docs.aspose.com/slides/python-net/convert-powerpoint-to-pdf/ SLIDESNET-43871 Individual text boxes are generated when importing PDF to PPTX Enhancement SLIDESNET-43561 Embedded fonts render incorrectly in Linux Enhancement https://docs.aspose.com/slides/python-net/convert-powerpoint-to-jpg/ Other Improvements and Changes Key Summary Category Related Documentation SLIDESPYNET-155 Use Aspose.
